record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - October 10, 2007)

[Page: H11415]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks and insert extraneous material on H.R. 2895.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
